sentences.english: Even cattle, which feed on alfalfa, depend on bees.
sentences.chinese: 就连以紫花苜蓿为食的牛也要依靠蜜蜂。

sentences.english: WUE of Aohan alfalfa was the highest in all alfalfa varieties.
sentences.chinese: 瞬时水分利用效率以敖汉苜蓿最高。

sentences.english: The proper complement of water at podding stage was benefit for plumping seeds of alfalfa.
sentences.chinese: 在结荚期适当的补充水分，有利于苜蓿籽粒饱满。

sentences.english: Strain XJ96077 was isolated from root nodules of alfalfa (Medicago sativa)from Xinjiang Reigon.
sentences.chinese: XJ96077菌株分离自新疆吐鲁番的苜蓿根瘤中。

sentences.english: The population dynamics of O. confuses and the incidence of reproductive age alfalfa closely related.
sentences.chinese: 二刺齿蓟马的发生数量与苜蓿的生育期密切相关。

sentences.english: Karyotype analysis of two species of Medicago.
sentences.chinese: 两种苜蓿植物的核型分析。

sentences.english: The plow with the four-leaf clover symbolizes the luck of the farmer.
sentences.chinese: 犁头和四叶苜蓿象征农夫的好运。

sentences.english: Karyotype analysis of Medicago sativa and Vicia villosa.
sentences.chinese: 紫花苜蓿和毛苕子染色体组型的研究。

sentences.english: At podding stage, the proper irrigation is beneficial to plumpness of alfalfa seeds.
sentences.chinese: 结荚期适当灌水有利于苜蓿籽粒饱满。

sentences.english: But there are clover plants that have leaves made up of four to six leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 但有些苜蓿长有由四片至六片小叶组成的叶子。

sentences.english: The CAD of alfalfa in early bloom was lower than that in budding stage and mid-bloom.
sentences.chinese: 紫花苜蓿初花期的CAD低于现蕾期和盛花期。

sentences.english: Heliothis viriplaca is an important leaf-feeding insect for soybean.
sentences.chinese: 苜蓿夜蛾是影响我国大豆生产的重要食叶性害虫之一。

sentences.english: So, next time you’re in the mood for a salad, don’t forget the alfalfa sprouts.
sentences.chinese: 所以下次你想吃色拉时，不要忘记加入苜蓿芽。

sentences.english: If you find a four-leaf clover, it will bring you happiness.
sentences.chinese: 若能找到四瓣叶片的苜蓿草，就能得到幸福。

sentences.english: Clover honey is light in colour with a delicate floral bouquet and flavor.
sentences.chinese: 苜蓿花的花瓣呈淡白色并具有特有的花香和味道。

sentences.english: Trefoil and clover cover the long lawn, daisies too.
sentences.chinese: 长草坪上长满了三叶草和苜蓿，也有很多雏菊。

definition: oilseed rape (Brassica napus)/flowering edible rape (Brassica chinensis var. oleifera)
